alert.note: Alert for Northwestern Fremont County Above 8500Ft; Pikes Peak above 11000 Ft; Teller County, Rampart Range above 7500fT, Pike's Peak Between 7500 And 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 07 at 2:38PM MST until November 09 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY HAS BEEN ISSUED FROM 3 PM WEDNESDAY TO 5 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 7 inches. * WHERE...Northwestern Fremont County Above 8500 Feet, Teller County, and Pikes Peak. * WHEN...From 3 PM Wednesday to 5 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northwestern Fremont County Above 8500Ft; Pikes Peak above 11000 Ft; Teller County, Rampart Range above 7500fT, Pike's Peak Between 7500 And 11000 Ft
